```{r}
#| include: false
talk <- function(title, author, info = NULL, location = NULL, duration = NULL, date, urls = NULL) {
  library(htmltools)
  html <- tags$div(class = "listItem",
    tags$div(class = "itemDetails",
      tags$div(class = "itemHeader",
        tags$div(class = "itemTitle", title)
      ),
      tags$div(class = "itemMeta",
        tags$span(class = "author", author),
        tags$span(class = "itemInfo", location),
        tags$span(class = "itemDate", sprintf("%s (%s)", date, duration))
      ),
      lapply(seq_along(urls), FUN = function(kk) {
        if (nzchar(urls[[kk]])) tags$a(href = urls[[kk]], names(urls)[kk])
      })
    )
  )
  knitr::asis_output(as.character(html))
} # talk()
```
